data.title: New Overlay: Margin
data.body: "Margin" is a new overlay that help you to calculate margin and markup easily.  You can enter any two values in the overlay and it will calculate another two for you.

data.title: Improvement on Currency Convert
data.body: You can access recent used currency at the top of the list in Currency Convert

data.title: New Overlay: Spell Number
data.body: You can now ask Calcsmos to spell the current value in different languages.  It can also speak for you.
